recommendations.text: I would like to recommend Mario Vojnić Hajduk, who worked within our company on software development projects using .NET and React technologies. During his time with us, Mario demonstrated a willingness to learn and a professional approach to assigned tasks. He contributed to the development and maintenance of applications, consistently meeting deadlines and adhering to project standards. He also had a brief opportunity to participate in our AI development team, where he showed interest in expanding his technical skill set. Mario is a reliable team member, capable of adapting to different project requirements and working collaboratively in a team environment. I believe that with continued experience and professional growth, he will further develop his skills and contribute positively to future teams.
